64902.<pc>は オアシスの水を\nツボの中に 注ぎ込んだ！: <pc> poured the Oasis Water into the pot!

64903.中から 声が 聞こえてくる……。: From inside, a voice can be heard...

64904.<voice 00080_00064904><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00080_00064904><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Whew! This is, unmistakably, our Arahaghiro Oasis
Water!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64265.<voice 00110_00064265><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00110_00064265><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>*gulp* *gulp* *gulp*...
I-I can move. I can move, I tell you!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64905.なんと ツボの中から\nわかめ王子が あらわれた！: Suddenly, a King Kelp emerged from the pot!

64267.<voice 00265_00064267><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00265_00064267><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>...Pheeew! I'm revived. Almost turned into kelp
chips!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64268.<voice 00295_00064268><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00295_00064268><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>The desert was drying me out, so I took refuge in
here, but when I went into the pot to check for
water, I was surprised to find it was empty...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64269.<voice 00351_00064269><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00351_00064269><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Furthermore, once I was inside, I couldn't get back
out until now... Good grief, this body is an
inconvenience...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64270.<voice 00421_00064270><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00421_00064270><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Well anyways, you're an unfamiliar person. What do
they call you?<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64271.<voice 00461_00064271><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00461_00064271><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>...Hmm, <pc>, eh? I see. Thanks for saving
me on such short notice. For your troubles, take
this as thanks!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64272.<voice 00582_00064272><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00582_00064272><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Hah, of course! If I can move now, I must return to
my kingdom as soon as possible... I have to return
to Arahaghiro Kingdom!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64273.<voice 00622_00064273><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00622_00064273><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Hahahhaa. You probably couldn't tell from my
appearance, but I'm actually Arahaghiro's king.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000079.<voice 00623_29000079><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00623_29000079><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Eh...? That means Arahaghiro is... There's no way
you're... King Moonis?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000080.<voice 00662_29000080><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00662_29000080><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Mmm.... That face says... That you doubt me?
It's the truth! There's a reason for this unpleasant,
unwelcome algae...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000081.<voice 00702_29000081><start_lip_sync m1: <voice 00702_29000081><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>...Tsk! I don't have time to talk about such things!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000082.<voice 00703_29000082><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00703_29000082><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>I've been absent for too long. I'm worried for my
Arahaghiro! Well then, farewell, everyone!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000084.<voice 00705_29000084><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00705_29000084><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...Is he the real deal?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000086.<voice 00707_29000086><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00707_29000086><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>He certainly acts like the King Moonis I met back

29000087.<voice 00708_29000087><start_lip_sync n0:

29000088.<voice 00709_29000088><start_lip_sync n0:
